title: INFINITI: IDRIS Virtual Assistant

languages.name: Javascript
languages.description: Javascript is my favourite programming language. I'm able to dive into an existing codebase or start from scratch. I'm familiar with ES6 and standard design patterns, and have experience with tons of javascript libraries.

shortDescription: I built a chat bot for INFINITI Global. It allows users to learn about their new QX50 vehicle. It uses natural language processing to figure out users intent, and is localized to Canadian English and French, as well as American English.

images.title: idris-na-1
images.description: Example of how the suggestions work. They are based on users input.
